item.description:
Coffee Talk invites you for an evening of coffee, other hot beverage and/or dinner followed by a ride to New Haven Light House Fantasy of Lights. This will be a combination December Monthly Meet Up and December Holidays Meet Up. The night shall start around 4:30 pm at

Village Inn Diner 699 Main Street East Haven , CT 06512 (203) 469 5759

http://www.nearhome.com/needfoodnow/ct/eastshore/villiageinn/index.htm

www.nearhome.com/needfoodnow/ct/eastshore/villiageinn/index.htm

Go to the link for a map and other information for The Village Inn Diner.

It is next door to the McDonalds on Main Street.

To save on costs going to the Fantasy of Lights, we should fill up our Vehicles with passengers at the Diner.

We can plan on who is going in what vehicle.

Then we can go down the street and hang a left to go to the New Haven Light House Fantasy of Lights.

Lighthouse Point Park 2 Lighthouse Road New Haven , CT 06512 (203) 946-8005

http://newhavengoodwill.easterseals.com/site/PageServer?pagename=CTNH_events

newhavengoodwill.easterseals.com/site/PageServer?pagename=CTNH_events

You have to turn your car radio channel to some Local AM frequency to listen to the presentation and music.

If you cannot go to the Fantasy of Lights on this date with this Meet Up Group,

Then you are encouraged to go enjoy this event on your own before it closes

At the end of the year.

If there is any bad weather, such as snow, ice or very hard rain, then Meet Ups will be automatically cancelled.

I do not want my members being injured for just coming to a Meet Up.

One time we had over 10 members attend a Village Inn Diner Meet Up.

We filled up three tables that night.

Lately Meet Ups have had been from none to 5 members in attendance.

Understandably some of you might be busy shopping for presents, working,

spending time with family or working on other projects.

If you have some spare time, then you are more than welcome to come have a cup of coffee with us.

Best Wishes

Happy Holidays.

Mike B

Organizer

change
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have purple backpack.
item.name: Coffee Talk @ Coffee & Light House Fantasy of Lights
